DocAttribute.Name: InterferenceGeometry
DocAttribute.Documentation: The geometric shape representation of the interference geometry that is provided in the object coordinate system of the _RelatingElement_ (mandatory) and in the object coordinate system of the _RelatedElement_ (optionally).

DocAttribute.Name: InterferenceType
DocAttribute.Documentation: Optional identifier that describes the nature of the interference. Examples could include 'Clash', 'ProvisionForVoid', etc.

DocAttribute.Name: ImpliedOrder
DocAttribute.Documentation: Logical value indicating whether the interference geometry should be subtracted from the _RelatingElement_ (if TRUE), or whether it should be either subtracted from the _RelatingElement_ or the _RelatedElement_ (if FALSE), or whether no indication can be provided (if UNKNOWN).

DocWhereRule.Name: NotSelfReference
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The instance of the _RelatingElement_ shall not be the same instance as the _RelatedElement_.
